Title: Captive
Plot: Green and Cassady follow the leads when a young boy is found murdered to a suspected serial pedophile/murderer.
GuestStars: Joseph Barbara, Liam Aiken, Kathryn Alexander, John Coughlin, Miles Kath, Mickey Solis, Wendell B. Franklin, J.C. Montgomery, Peter Picard, Lauren B. Martin, Eric Zuckerman, Ed Vassallo, Maya Days, Tyler Richards
